doc.title: Tastasies, Waldorf, MD - Pricing & Reviews
doc.description: Learn what Tastasies is really about. Access real reviews, package pricing, ratings and more. Save time and money by comparing the top Catering, Decorations and Wedding Event Planners near Waldorf MD 202-285-7254
doc.tags: Tastasies, Waldorf, Maryland, MD, 20602, Catering,Decorations,Wedding Event Planners Ratings, Reviews, Pricing

main.p:
Tastasies Event Planning, LLC, is not just your ordinary planning company, we specialize in wedding and special event planning as well as total event management. So be it small or large give us a call to work together to bring your visions to life!
Monica C. Warren, Principal Consultant (202) 285-7254
